mng: to guard against, to exhort, to admonish or warn, to give up or stop doing sth, Buddhist monastic discipline, ring (for a finger)

exm.mng: to kick a drug habit, to abstain from drugs
to quit, to give up (a bad habit)
to take precautions, to guard against (emergency)
to warn, to alert, to be on the alert, to stand guard, sentinel
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muck-rake, Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
